footer.title-cta: Let's Make Your Dream a Reality
footer.description-cta: Don’t wait to start your real estate journey. Whether you’re buying, selling, or renting, our expert team is here to guide you every step of the way. Let’s turn your vision into reality with personalized service and a seamless experience.
footer.description-footer: We make your real estate journey smooth and worry-free. Whether you’re buying, selling, or need legal support – our team is here to guide you every step of the way.
footer.title-popular-locations-5: Properties for sale in The Golden Mile

home.title-2-about-us: We are here to help you
home.title-3-about-us: Find your dream home in spain
home.paragraph-about-us: We are passionate about simplifying the real estate experience. With a deep understanding of the housing market and a client-first approach, we empower buyers, sellers, and renters to move forward with confidence. Our dedicated team of experienced professionals provides personalized service, transparency, and expert guidance at every step. In addition to real estate expertise, we offer legal support, NIE applications, and financial assistance, ensuring our clients benefit from a complete, reliable service under one roof.
home.title-category: Select The Home That Suits You
home.paragraph-why-choose-us: At Baruch Real Estate, we believe finding a home is more than just securing a roof over your head. It’s about discovering a place that perfectly matches your lifestyle. Our team of experts, extensive listings, and commitment to customer satisfaction set us apart in delivering a seamless real estate experience.

hero.title: Your Trusted Partner
hero.description: At Baruch Real Estate, we understand that buying or selling a property is only one part of the journey. Starting a new life in Spain often involves much more, which is why we provide a range of additional services to guide you step by step through the process.

others3.subtitle: Mission & Vision
others3.title: Tailored Real Estate Services on the Costa del Sol

forbuyersDescription.list1: Personalized property searches tailored to your lifestyle and goals.
forbuyersDescription.list2: Expert guidance on local neighborhoods, schools, and communities.
forbuyersDescription.list4: Skilled negotiation to get you the best deal.
forbuyersDescription.list5: Trusted lawyers in-house for legal support.
forbuyersDescription.list6: Financial partners to ensure a smooth transaction.

forseellersDescription.list1: Accurate property valuations based on real market data.
forseellersDescription.list2: Premium marketing with professional photography and compelling descriptions.
forseellersDescription.list3: Exposure to both local and international buyers.
forseellersDescription.list4: Negotiation expertise to maximize your sale price.
forseellersDescription.list5: Full support from listing to closing.

others4.subtitle: Ready for the next step?
others4.title: We’ll be more than happy to guide you and make the process as smooth as possible.

conatct-section.title: Our Services
conatct-section.description: At Baruch Real Estate, we believe in building lasting relationships based on trust, transparency, and personal contact. For us, real estate is not just about properties, it’s about people. We guide you through the process step by step. With care, clarity and a focus on quality at every stage. And our support doesn’t stop once you’ve bought a property.

meet-the-team.subtitle: Ready for the next step?
meet-the-team.title: Let’s connect
meet-the-team.description: Please fill in your details below so we can contact you.

services.title: Real Estate Services Tailored Solutions
services.card-1-description: At Baruch, we know that buying and home is one life's biggest milestones, Our experienced team is here guide.
services.card-2-description: Selling your home doesn't have to be overwhelming. With Baruch, our and dedicated experts will make process.
services.card-3-description: Finding the right rental property is easy with Housebox. Whether you're seeking a cozy apartment spacious.
services.property-services-description: By combining these services with our real estate expertise, we make the entire process of buying, owning, and living in Spain more transparent and less stressful. We always try to support you, even long after the purchase has been completed.

modal.subtitle: We are passionate about simplifying the real estate process in Spain. With a deep understanding of the housing market in Spain and a client-first approach, we strive to help buyers, sellers, and renters achieve their property goals.

nie.title: NIE/Residency
nie.description: We facilitate the entire process of obtaining your NIE (Foreign Identity Number) and residency in Spain. Our team will guide you through all necessary documentation and administrative procedures.
nie.detail2: Management of appointments at immigration offices

finance.title: Finance/Mortgage
finance.description: We help you find the best mortgage financing options for your property. We work with leading financial institutions to secure the most favorable conditions.
finance.detail2: Comparison of offers from multiple banks

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.description: We offer comprehensive insurance solutions to protect your real estate investment. From home insurance to life and health insurance.

tax.title: Tax Returns
tax.description: Our team of tax experts handles all your tax obligations in Spain, ensuring compliance with all current regulations.

legal.title: Legal Services
legal.description: We have a legal team specialized in real estate law that will assist you in all legal aspects of your real estate transaction.

management.title: Property Management
management.description: We manage your property comprehensively, from maintenance to tenant management, so you can enjoy your investment worry-free.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Question
faq.question-1: What services does Baruch Real Estate offer?
faq.answer-1: Baruch Real Estate offers buying, selling, and renting services, as well as property management and investment advice on the Costa del Sol.
faq.question-2: Why should I choose Baruch Real Estate?
faq.answer-2: Baruch Real Estate provides personalized service, expert local knowledge, and a dedicated team to guide you through every step of your real estate journey.
faq.question-3: How can Baruch help me find the right property?
faq.answer-3: Baruch Real Estate listens to your needs and preferences, then curates a selection of properties that match your lifestyle and goals.
faq.question-4: Does Baruch Real Estate assist with legal paperwork?
faq.answer-4: Yes, Baruch Real Estate has trusted in-house lawyers to help you with all legal documentation and ensure a smooth transaction.
faq.question-5: Can Baruch help me sell my property quickly?
faq.answer-5: Baruch Real Estate uses premium marketing strategies and a wide network to attract both local and international buyers, helping you sell efficiently.
faq.question-6: What areas does Baruch Real Estate cover?
faq.answer-6: Baruch Real Estate specializes in properties across the Costa del Sol, including Marbella, Estepona, Benahavís, and surrounding areas.
faq.question-7: Does Baruch offer property management services?
faq.answer-7: Yes, Baruch Real Estate provides comprehensive property management to ensure your investment is well cared for, even when you are away.
faq.question-8: How does Baruch support international buyers?
faq.answer-8: Baruch Real Estate offers multilingual support, guidance on local regulations, and assistance with all aspects of purchasing property from abroad.
faq.question-9: What makes Baruch Real Estate different from other agencies?
faq.answer-9: Baruch Real Estate stands out for its commitment to client satisfaction, transparency, and a tailored approach to every client’s needs.
faq.question-10: How do I contact Baruch Real Estate for a consultation?
faq.answer-10: You can contact Baruch Real Estate through our website, by phone, or by visiting our office. Our team is ready to assist you with any questions.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.description: We’re here to help you every step of the way in finding your dream property in Spain. Feel free to reach out to us anytime with no obligations, no pressure. Use the contact form below to get in touch, and we’ll respond as soon as possible.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description:
You’re welcome to visit our office in Málaga for a personal meeting, or we’d be happy to accompany you on a property visit. Whether you have questions about buying, selling, financing, or residency, our team is ready to assist. 

We speak Dutch, English, and Spanish, ensuring clear communication and support throughout the process.

contact-form.subtitle: Ready for the next step?
contact-form.title: Let’s connect
contact-form.description: We’ll be more than happy to guide you and make the process as smooth as possible.
contact-form.separator: Or contact us directly on WhatsApp
